mapper.select:
select category.id categoryid, category.brandid categorybrandid, category.name categoryname,
category2.category2id category2category2id, category2.categoryid category2categoryid, category2.name category2name,
project.id projectid, project.category2id projectcategory2id, project.name projectname
from category left join category2 on category.id = category2.categoryid left join project on project.category2id = category2.category2id where category.brandid = #{brandid};
